alert.note: Alert for Cullman; Marshall (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:52PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Marshall and northeastern Cullman Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Arab to near McLarty. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albertville, Guntersville, Arab, Douglas, Union Grove, High Point, Eddy, Horton, Joppa and Rabbit Town. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
